alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlienShip, ShipEntity, Shot

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract super class for all objects that move around the screen and are controlled by the gameloop.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        java.lang.String TAG

      • hitBox

        private android.graphics.Rect hitBox
        The area considered to be the entity for collisions

      • width

        private int width

      • height

        private int height

      • vx

        private double vx
        The speeds both x and y of the entity on the screen. Remember that positive y is down the screen

      • vy

        private double vy

      • x

        private double x
        The entities current position on the screen. Remember that (0,0) is the top left corner

      • y

        private double y

      • lastUpdateTime

        protected long lastUpdateTime
        The last time (in milliseconds) that the update method was called. This allows you to account for changes in the game loop's execution speed. This gives you smoother motion regardless

      • image

        protected android.graphics.Bitmap image
        The image to be drawn representing the Entity. Bitmaps are similar to BufferedImages in AWT

      • valid

        protected boolean valid
        Flag denoting whether or not the game loop should remove this entity from the list of entities

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int resId,
              double vx,
              double vy,
              double x,
              double y,
              int width,
              int height)
        Create a new Entity object.
        Parameters:
        resId - The Android resource for the Entity image. In form R.drawable.[filename no extension]
        vx - The horizontal speed
        vy - The vertical speed
        x - The horizontal location
        y - The vertical location
        width - The width of the object
        height - The height of the object

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas c)
        This draws the entity's image on the screen at the current location See android.graphics.Canvas
        Parameters:
        c - The Canvas to be drawn on

      • updateHitBox

        protected void updateHitBox()
        This updates the location of the Entity's hitbox once the entity has moved

      • getHitBox

        public android.graphics.Rect getHitBox()
        Returns:
        The Entity's current hitbox

      • update

        public void update()
        Called every game loop to update the Entity's state. By default it moves the Entity by its speed multiplied the time since the last loop execution. This makes for smoother graphics. If you want an animated image, this would be the place to update the frame.

      • checkHitBox

        public abstract void checkHitBox()
        To be implemented by subclasses. Determines if there is any sectiom that needs to be taken based on the Entity's current position.

      • getVy

        public double getVy()
        Returns:
        The current vertical velocity.

      • setVy

        public void setVy(double vy)
        Set the current vertical velocity.
        Parameters:
        vy - The new vertical velocity

      • getVx

        public double getVx()
        Get the current horizontal velocity
        Returns:
        The current horizontal velocity.

      • setVx

        public void setVx(double vx)
        Set the horizontal velocity.
        Parameters:
        vx - The new horizontal velocity to be set.

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Get the current horizontal location
        Returns:
        The Entity's current horizontal location.

      • setX

        public void setX(double x)
        Set the x position
        Parameters:
        x - The new horizontal position to be set

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Get the current y position.
        Returns:
        The current vertical position of the top of the entity.

      • setY

        public void setY(double y)
        Set the current vertical position of the Entity.
        Parameters:
        y - The new vertical position to be set.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get the height of the Entity.
        Returns:
        The current height of the entity.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Get the width of the entity.
        Returns:
        the current width.

      • collidedWith

        public boolean collidedWith(Entity other)
        Check to see if the Entity has collided with another entity.
        Parameters:
        other - The Entity to see if the have collided with
        Returns:
        true if they have collided false otherwise

      • collideAction

        public abstract void collideAction(Entity other)
        To be implemented by subclasses. Actions to be performed in the event that this entity has collided with another.
        Parameters:
        other - The Entity that collided with this Entity

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Tells the gameloop whether or not to destroy this entity.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is still valid false if it should be destroyed
